title: Central Jersey chorus presents online program of late 19th and 20th century songs
body: Soprano Alex Meakem and baritone Michael Banks will be part of Voices Chorale NJ's online "An Evening of Late 19th and 20th Century Songs" performance and lecture 7:30 p.m. Monday, April 19.Hopewell-based  will present an online “Evening of Late 19th and 20th Century Songs” concert and lecture 7:30 p.m. Monday, April 19.Soprano Alex Meakem and baritone Michael Banks will perform songs, duets and arias by Puccini, Sondheim, Lloyd Webber and others, “highlighting the human experience of love and longing.” They will be accompanied by pianist Akiko Hosaki.Pianist Akiko Hosaki will be part of Voices Chorale NJ's online "An Evening of Late 19th and 20th Century Songs" performance and lecture 7:30 p.m. Monday, April 19.Voices Chorale NJ artistic director David A. McConnell will provide context and commentary.Tickets are $15. Sign up at .Note to readers: if you purchase something through one of our affiliate links we may earn a commission.
